Description: Sir Corbett Men Black Semiformal Shoes
Reviews:
["Though it looked nice when it was delivered, but the product comes out to be of poor quality.
Just within 3 months of purchasing, the shoe got teared at the sole, something that never happened with other branded shoes (like redtape) I used in recent past.

I am not a person who has to run or walk a lot during the day, just going to office in morning by own car and returning in evening. Little bit of walk within same floor... that's all about my physical activity. Not good from health's point of view but very good for shoes.

I expect my shoes to last at least a year. Not happy with this product, won't purchase form this brand, neither would recommend others.

Abhik Das", 'Quality of shoe is good for the price. Sir Corbett has never disappointed in that. The toe end of the shoe seems a little tight for my usual size. So will suggest to buy a size larger than usual. ', "Size is accurate and quality is so good. This is my first order from Myntra and with this experience I'm going to order many things from Myntra only. Thanks for the before time delivery in this difficult time ?"]

Description: Roadster Men Navy Blue Washed Denim Jacket
Reviews:
["It's nice danim I bought it very cheap price maybe 600 hundred or less than that 
It's worth the money if you have around 1 then only it's worth money 
My height is 5'10 5'11 
It's short jacket length of jacket short so of want short jacket than nice 
It's not That much short but it's Little short
I like this this and I style it different way with different clothes ", 'If you are 6.1 to 6.2 tall and wanted to wear this with front button locked then dont  buy this because its looks really short in length although i really like the fabric in this budget segment ', "Awesome jacket. I didn't expect it to be this THICK. Its pretty heavy as well. being made of cotton you can't expect it to keep you very warm. It could be a little helpful in a windy area. Super trendy, super awesome.  I love this jacket. Best thing - you can rock it with pretty much any clothes. "]

Description: El Paso Women Black Solid Lightweight Sneakers
Reviews:
["Looks wise it's really classy however there is no cushioning on the foot bed and it might impact your heel area. It got uncomfortable because of uncushioned sole. Although i received a smaller size than what was shown in the chart and it did not fit me at all even though i had ordered the correct size. Rest all good if you're able to manage the hard sole", 'Good quality but I take the size 6 and it came with a 
size 39
So you have to take less size otherwise it is an aesthetic shoe', "Looks really good. But has a very hard flat surface. 
Also a bit heavy when you wear it first but you will be habitual once you wear it all day. 
Goes with every outfit. 
If you don't have any issue or pain in your ankles, you an go for it."]

Description: Nike Men Air Force 1 07 Leather Sneakers
Reviews: ['Shoes are good compared to complete white ones. This panda model is the best substitute for those who are unhappy with cheap quality of panda dunks. The sole would be a little hard, leather is good, colour is excellent, comfort is okay, break-in is required to find much comfort. A rare piece in India, so grab it without second thought. ', "There's no better Sneaker than an Air Force 1....That too in a Panda Colourway?!! Loved the Shoe Box it came with Inside-out totally worth it!! It has a Great feel to it!! 10/10 ", "Just a WOW Pair. Must have one in your collection. These can be styled with multiple outfits. Nike Dunk Panda Lovers, Here's An Alternative For You With Better Quality & AF Design. "]

Description: HRX by Hrithik Roshan Men White And Blue Memory Foam Technology Running Shoes
Reviews:
["I recently purchased a pair of HRX shoes, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These shoes are not only stylish but incredibly comfortable as well. The design is versatile, allowing me to wear them for various occasions. The fit is perfect, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the craftsmanship. The quality of materials used is evident, and these shoes have proven to be durable. Whether I'm walking around the city or dressing up for a special event, these shoes have become my go-to choice. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a combination of style, comfort, and quality in their footwear.", "Shoes are no doubt good actually i can say almost worth it. but its not for rough sports just for casual hangout and all.
And there is 2 things which i didn't liked much
1) sole is made up of Eva foam.
2) laces which don't look durable it should be more thick.
apart from this colour and material is perfect for mesh and colour part.", "Very Nice & Comfortable Product üëå üëç
